title: West Pakistan Departmental Inquiries (Powers) Act, 1958
description: Official consolidated text of West Pakistan Departmental Inquiries (Powers) Act, 1958 (XLV of 1958) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and extent. (1) This Act may be called the West Pakistan Departmental Inquiries
provisions.content:
(Powers) Act, 1958.
1
[(2) It extends to the whole of the Province of West Pakistan, except the Tribal Areas.]

provisions.title: Section 2. Power to summon witnesses and to compel production of documents. An officer
provisions.content:
conducting a departmental inquiry against a Government servant under any rules for the time being in
force, may exercise the same powers for compelling the attendance of witnesses 2[,] production of
documents 2[and issuing commissions for the examination of witnesses] as are exercisable by a civil
court under the Code of Civil Procedure, 1908 (V of 1908):
Provided that the process issued by the officer conducting the departmental inquiry shall be
served and executed by the civil court having jurisdiction in the place where the witness or the person
in possession of the document, as the case may be, resides.

provisions.title: Section 3. Penalties. Any person disobeying a process issued by an officer in exercise of the powers
provisions.content:
conferred by section 2 shall be liable to the same penalties to which he would have been liable if he
had disobeyed a process issued by the civil court.

provisions.title: Section 4. Repeal. The West Pakistan Departmental Inquiries (Powers) Ordinance, 1958 (West
provisions.content:
Pakistan Ordinance No. XV of 1958), is hereby repealed.
RGN Date: 22-08-2025
1
Subs. by the West Pakistan Laws (Extension to Karachi) Ordinance, 1964 (VII of 1964), s. 2 and Sch.
